profile: AVL Landscape and design is a family orientated company with over 15 years of experience within the industry. Our number one priority is pleasing our clients and fulfilling their expectations. Our vast knowledge of top-rated products and design allows our staff to cater uniquely to each project. We specialize in custom landscaping, offering personalized cedar decks, interlocking, concrete, water features (such as ponds, waterfalls), outdoor lighting effects, fireplaces and outdoor kitchens. We take great pride in our work and maintain a high standard of excellence in everything we do. We look forward to working on your next outdoor project and promise nothing less than the best.
name: Avl Landscape & Design

profile:
Fast, efficient, and honest, TOP Renovation has become a reputable home renovation company. Our team is up for every job, managing projects with the skill and experience our clients have come to expect.

TOP Renovation offers a wide range of renovation options from kitchen, bathroom, basement, whole house, painting and flooring. We work closely with customers to develop their ideal home renovation. We want our customers to be satisfied with our work, which is why we provide open communication channels throughout the duration of each project.

TOP Renovation has gained a solid reputation in GTA area and maintains an A+ rating with most of our clients. We encourage you to check our current standing! We strive to provide complete satisfaction to our customers, which provides consistent referrals for new work.

Our beautiful showroom provides access to the most populous selection of tiles, floorings, lights, walls, handrails, woodboards and other accessories from famous brands, feel free to contact us today and make an appointment.
services: installation kitchen tiles, bathroom, basement, whole house, painting and flooring

profile:
Drywall Pro-Finishing is a drywall Installation and taping company known for quality residential and commercial work. That is because we provide a high-quality finish and take the time to do the job right. Our projects are never complete until you’re 100% satisfied with our work. We won’t leave until you’re happy because it’s just that important to us. Drywall Pro-Finishing company offers very competitive prices for a range of services: supplying and installing drywall, and insulating to finished drywall ready for paint. We proudly offer the following services for our valued customers: • supply and install drywall • taping, mudding, sanding and suppling all related materials • popcorn (stucco) removal and smooth ceiling and much more... All projects are kept clean and are conducted in a safe manner. Drywall Pro-Finishing company prides for quality, its experienced team of tradesman, and competitive pricing.

We have enterprising new ideas and old-fashioned ideals. We have a lot of experience within the industry providing Drywall Installation and Taping, and also Replacement and Repair.

Drywall Pro-Finishing has achieved an excellent reputation for professionalism, high standard of craftsmanship and for consideration of attention to detail.

*****
Check out our Social pages for more information;
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/Drywall-Pro-Finishing-1921867904523004/
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/drywallprofinishing/

profile:
During the past twenty years we are proud to be known as the most dependable, innovative and skilled contractors in the industry. 
We have a wide range of experience and expertise in Residential, Retail and Commercial accounts. 
This comes as a result of the structured focus of our team in building lasting and beneficial relationships with our clients. 
We invite you to browse through our website. Should there be any interest in receiving an estimate, do not hesitate to contact us.

Quality Assurance isn't just our name it's also one of our highest achievable priorities that we stand by. 
Successful control over our contracts has always been an important part of our philosophy. 
Our approach to maintaining high standards of workmanship and to assure customer satisfaction, our customer retention rate is a key factor to our business successes. 
Quality controls are maintained by doing regular quality check points with our clients.

We start with a detailed analysis of each contract, collecting all pertinent data needed for the preparation of a realistic service 
proposal. Our knowledge of the assessed account enables us to prepare both Scheduling and Quality Assurance.

Give A Call - 905-955-5248
